reporter-output.line: Open url 'http://install.qa5.nbcupublisher7.publisher7.com'.
Enter 'admin@publisher.nbcuni.com' in the 'Email Address' text box.
Enter 'pa55word' in the 'Password' text box.
Click the 'Login' button.
Mouse over the 'Content' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Add content' menu link.
Click the 'Post' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Post dialog'.
Enter '8fd9ba51db55411' in the 'Title' text box.
Switch to the Synopsis frame.
Enter a randomized text string into the 'Body' text area.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Post dialog'.
Click the 'Cover' select button.
Switch to the select file frame.
Enter the file path for file upload.
Click the 'Upload' button.
Wait for the file link to be visible after upload.
Click the 'Next' button.
Click the 'Public Local Files' radio button.
Click the 'Next' button.
Verify the file image 'HanSolo' is present.
Verify the img is loaded and visible.
Click the 'Save' button.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Post dialog'.
Scroll the 'Publishing Options' link into view.
Click the 'Publishing Options' link.
Select 'Draft' from the 'Moderation State' drop down list.
Click the 'Save' button.
Verify success message of 'Post 8fd9ba51db55411 has been created.' is present.
Click the 'Modules' menu link.
Switch to frame titled 'Modules'.
Enter 'Pub Gigya' in the 'Filter Name' text box.
Wait for the module titled 'Pub Gigya' to appear in the list.
Check the 'Pub Gigya' check box.
Click the 'Save configuration' button.
Switch to frame titled 'Some required modules must be enabled'.
Click the 'Continue' button to enable additional modules.
Switch back to the 'Modules' frame.
Switch to frame titled 'Modules'.
Verify success message of 'The configuration options have been saved.' is present.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Mouse over the 'Configuration' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Web services' menu link.
Click the 'Gigya settings' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Gigya settings dialog'.
Click the 'Share' link in the work bench.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Gigya settings dialog'.
Enter 'Tumblr, email, googleplus-interactive ,foursquare, print, twitter-tweet, facebook-like' in the Privider text box.
Click the 'ADVANCED SHARE BAR SETTINGS' link to expand advanced menu options.
Enter 'wrap|true' in the 'Advanced showShareBarUI settings' text area.
Click the 'Save configuration' button.
Verify success message of 'The configuration options have been saved.' is present.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Click the 'Content' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Content dialog'.
Enter title 8fd9ba51db55411.
Click the 'Apply' button.
Click the first search title link in the search result set.
Verify the Tumblr gigya share link is present.
Verify the Email gigya share link is present.
Verify the Google Plus gigya share link is present.
Verify the Foursquare gigya share link is present.
Verify the Print gigya share link is present.
Verify the Twitter gigya share link is present.
Verify the Facebook gigya share link is present.
